title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 400.9 - Reporting of tests of steam meters
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 400.9 - Reporting of tests of steam meters

State Regulations
(a) Reports of of complaint, periodic and
office tests of steam meters shall be made each month and filed with the
commission not later than the 15th day of the following month on forms 81/2 x
11 inches in size as shown in section
400.10
of this Part. (b) If no complaint, periodic or office tests
are made, the form shown in section
400.10
of this Part shall be filed
regularly bearing the statement "NO TESTS MADE."
Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
400.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
